title: I need a collection of information on Australian companies
snippet:
I have an excel file with blank cells to be filled. Seeking names of c-level execs or comparable positions including CEO (or MD), CFO (or Financial Controller/Finance Director/General Manager Finance), COO (or Operations Manager), CIO (or IT Manager).

Require EMAILS for each. Seeking also Company URL and phone.  Also require email convention ie: john.smith@company.com.au OR jsmith@company.com.au OR john@company.com etc etc...  

Require all cells to be filled for around 240 unique companies. Would require this to be done by 4th November 2016.
